name: Strawberry Lip Balm
shortDescription: Gently apply on lips using your fingertips and evenly spread throughout. Best results when used after Fascinatingly Dark LIP SCRUB.
fullDescription: Fascinatingly Dark lip balms are made with 100% natural ingredients .Keeps your lips moisturised.Protects lips from harmful external factors.It helps soften the lIps.

name: Rose Lip and Cheek Tint
shortDescription: Moisturise lips and cheeks. Dab some tint on the back of your hand using roll on bottle.Using fingertips gently massage it on cheeks and lips and leave it until dry.
fullDescription: Fascinatingly Dark lip and cheek tint is extremely long lasting. Multipurpose product as it can be used as blush, lip colour and eyeshadow.Waterproof and smudgeproof. Blends easily onto skin.)

name: Silver Ice Crème Highlighter
shortDescription: Apply the highlighter on the cheekbone,bridge of nose below brows with the stick and blend.You can also mix with foundation to get beautiful glow.
fullDescription: Fascinatingly Dark Glorious creme highlighter is natural and stays for more than 12 hours.Waterproof and Blends easily onto skin.

name: Carmine Hot Hue
shortDescription: Apply the Lip Hue on your lips with the stick.Can also be applied on cheek as a tint.
fullDescription: Fascinatingly Dark Hot Hue is natural and doesnot harm lips Waterproof and Blends easily onto lips.It gives natural pigment to the lips.

name: Glossious Lip Gloss(Strawberry)
shortDescription: Apply the Glossious lip gloss on your lips with the stick.
fullDescription: Our Strawberry scented GLOSSIOUS LIP GLOSS transforms lips from dr and damaged, to plump and luscious. This non-sticky & light weight formula deeply hydrates,comforts, and leaves lips looking smooth and naturally plumped.
